name: RN apps: Image in message attachment

customFields.Priority P1 to P4: P2 - Core Functions (Do core functions work?)

inline.description:
RN Apps: Image in message attachment
–––––––––––––––––––––––––
  1. View a message attachment post with image (can easily observe in QA: UI Test Automation channel - Mattermost Build report)
  2. Observe the border of the image
inline.expectedResult: • Image container should respect the padding and be larger than the image dimensions and center the image.

customFields.Related ticket(s): RN App: UI defect on border of image in message attachment — MM-18934
